alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jacksonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Mayport, Craig Field, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline, Talbot Island and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
